title: Define project requirements and goals
description: Outline the specific needs and objectives of PlataformaVentasIa, including but not limited to performance metrics, key features, integration points, and user personas. This will ensure a successful development process. To provide clarity, consider breaking down the requirements into sub-tasks that can be assigned to relevant team members. This might include defining the minimum viable product (MVP), creating user stories, and establishing acceptance criteria. Additionally, it would be beneficial to clarify the technology stack, data privacy and security measures, and scalability plans for the platform.

title: Design AI algorithm for customer behavior analysis
description: Create an artificial intelligence model that analyzes the behavior of clients on the platform.

title: Develop frontend for user interaction
description: Design the interface that allows users to interact with PlataformaVentasIa.

title: Develop backend for AI integration and data management
description: Create the necessary server-side infrastructure to manage data, integrate AI algorithms, and support platform functionality.
dependencies: Design AI algorithm for customer behavior analysis

title: Implement database schema and connections
description: Establish the database structure and connections needed for storing data and integrating with frontend and backend components.
dependencies: Develop backend for AI integration and data management

title: Configure DevOps pipeline and tools
description: Set up the development, testing, and deployment processes to streamline project progress.

title: Test platform for functionality and performance
description: Perform quality assurance testing to ensure the platform functions correctly and efficiently.
dependencies: Develop backend for AI integration and data management

title: Implement security measures
description: Ensure the platform is secure by implementing appropriate security measures.
dependencies: Develop backend for AI integration and data management

title: Document the development process
description: Write technical documentation to help developers maintain, update, and expand PlataformaVentasIa in the future.
dependencies: Develop backend for AI integration and data management
